name: bombsearcher
description:
2D MINESWEEPER GAME

Move around, dig some hole, avoid bombs. That's simple. Try to finish your job as soon as possible. How long will you finish it?

Features

  • Minesweeper with 2D movement
  • Ok art style?
  • A cat 🐱 and a dog 🐶

Controls

KeyActionWMove UpAMove LeftSMove DownDMove RightJDigKFlag

Credits
